France lawmakers seek deal on tougher migration billA group of French lawmakers met on Tuesday to try and strike a deal on a contested bill that will toughen France's immigration laws and has highlighted the difficulties for President Emmanuel Macron of running the country with no majority in parliament. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 10:16:48 GMT VJAWFUHZAZNJDPOJBDUPWO5RLY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-lawmakers-seek-deal-tougher-migration-bill-2023-12-19/Elizabeth Pineau世界欧洲
Australia court finds Melbourne man guilty of foreign interferenceAn Australia court on Tuesday found a Melbourne man who held prominent positions in Chinese community associations guilty of planning an act of foreign interference, the first verdict of its kind under a law introduced in 2018. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 09:49:21 GMT KR45U76BLZNVLJDZSDQESLSEHY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-court-finds-melbourne-man-guilty-foreign-interference-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Vessel approached by four small boats in Red Sea - UKMTO reportA vessel was approached by four small boats at the mouth of the Red Sea, 80 nautical miles northeast of Djibouti on Tuesday, according to a report posted by the United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO). Tue, 19 Dec 2023 09:47:03 GMT 6EOGOZA2P5NWVPOYRXFUTTV4RE https://www.reuters.com/world/vessel-approached-by-four-small-boats-red-sea-ukmto-report-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
UN decries Russia's failure to protect Ukraine civiliansUnited Nations human rights chief Volker Turk said on Tuesday there had been an "extensive failure" by Russia to take adequate measures to protect civilians in Ukraine and that there were indications that Russian forces had committed war crimes. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 09:46:22 GMT OIGNXRVGABPXVEYYKN6HEWZFH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/un-decries- Russias-failure-protect-ukraine-civilians-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Guinea warns of power cuts after blast destroys fuel stocksAn explosion at an oil terminal in Guinea's capital Conakry, which killed 14 people and injured 190, could lead to electricity outages as the majority of the terminal's fuel tanks are out of service, the government said late on Monday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:52:36 GMT ZKKQE7PSURNLHF5CGDBZ7IVSO4 https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/guinea-warns-power-cuts-after-blast-destroys-fuel-stocks-2023-12-19/Reuters世界非洲
Explainer: US, Asian allies launch system to track North Korea missiles in real-timeSouth Korea, the United States and Japan said on Tuesday they have activated a new system to detect and assess North Korea's missile launches in real-time. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:50:09 GMT 5N2NXZD4LZMLXADCTISYOUFO54 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-asian-allies-launch-system-track-north-korea-missiles-real-time-2023-12-19/Soo-Hyang Choi世界亚太地区
Hundreds stranded as parts of India's Tamil Nadu flooded after heavy rainHeavy rain has paralysed several parts of India's southern state of Tamil Nadu, inundating roads, affecting train services, and leaving authorities scrambling to rescue those stranded. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:39:31 GMT CJYHSBQSGRP5VBZ3Q5JBHXSRPI https://www.reuters.com/world/india/hundreds-stranded-parts-indias-tamil-nadu-flooded-after-heavy-rain-2023-12-19/Praveen Paramasivam世界印度
Turkey finds no financial abuse by firm US targeted over Hamas tiesTurkey said it had reviewed the financial activities of a company whose shareholders were sanctioned by the United States on the grounds of providing aid to Hamas and found there was no abuse of its financial system. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:24:13 GMT PMZLXH2GPKIPHAIK322OHXQAU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-finds-no-financial-abuse-by-firm-us-targeted-over-hamas-ties-2023-12-19/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine's frontline judges deliver justice under fireOlha Konoplenko's eastern Ukrainian city is occupied by Russian forces, but that hasn't stopped her from trying to uphold the law remotely as a judge. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:04:29 GMT 3P3KJKPSYZIPRBGHKC7WLTOZCU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-frontline-judges-deliver-justice-under-fire-2023-12-19/Thomas Peter, Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Large Icelandic volcano eruption misses local townLava from a large volcanic eruption in Iceland appeared to flow away from the only town in the area, offering hope that homes would be spared, geologists and rescue officials said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:43:41 GMT YXXIA4L2MVKKNANGP5JRKHMRWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/large-icelandic-volcano-eruption-misses-local-town-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Rare smog puts Sydney on par with New Delhi as bushfires rageAir quality in Sydney plummeted on Tuesday to levels among the world's worst as smoke from bushfires in the north blanketed the harbour city, taking large swathes into index ranges on par with New Delhi, one of the world's most crowded capitals. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:37:31 GMT D76DRQBIMBMHHGGT4IZE3KBEII https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/rare-smog-puts-sydney-par-with-new-delhi-bushfires-rage-2023-12-19/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
